actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that a committee cost estimate will not be required to be contained in a committee report if such report contains a cost estimate prepared by the Congressional Budget Office.

summary.text: Amends rule XIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to declare that a committee cost estimate, with respect to the cost of such legislation to affected parties, will not be required to be contained in a committee report if such report contains a cost estimate prepared by the Congressional Budget Office.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that a committee cost estimate will not be required to be contained in a committee report if such report contains a cost estimate prepared by the Congressional Budget Office.
